diagrams.code:
direction right
// Title
title Tactic Retrieval Architecture for Theorem Proving

// Repository as database of premises and tactics
Repository [color: lightgray, icon: database] {
  Premise Database [icon: book-open, color: white]
  Tactic Database [icon: code, color: white]
}

// Inference pipeline
Proof State [shape: oval, icon: file-text, color: lightblue]
Query Mechanism [shape: rectangle, icon: search, color: lightgreen]
Retriever Model [shape: rectangle, icon: cpu, color: orange]
Selector and Generator [shape: rectangle, color: purple]
Tactic Application [shape: rectangle, icon: play, color: lightblue]
Successful Application? [shape: diamond, icon: check-square, color: red]

// Feedback loop for improving retrieval
Feedback Loop [color: lightcyan, icon: refresh-cw] {
  Retrain Retriever Model [icon: cpu, color: white]
  Augment Repository [icon: database, color: white]
}

// Relationships
Proof State > Query Mechanism: Analyze Proof State
Query Mechanism > Retriever Model: Encode and Form Query
Retriever Model > Repository: Search Tactics and Premises
Retriever Model > Selector and Generator: Provide Retrieved Tactics
Selector and Generator > Tactic Application: Execute Tactic
Tactic Application > Successful Application?: Evaluate Outcome
Augment Repository > Repository: Store Successful Tactics
Successful Application? > Feedback Loop: Yes
Retriever Model < Repository: Return Candidates
Retriever Model < Retrain Retriever Model: Update Retrieval Model
Selector and Generator < Successful Application?: No
